----- Original Message -----
From: James
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Sent: Tuesday, May 25, 1999 6:44 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] LESSER SHIELDING


So you know. I was killed in fithwell after I con a guard. It said indfferently. So I uninvised my self. Well the gm said that thats just faction standing, and has nothing t do with ratial hatried when you con something. Kind of silly isnt it.


question: I killed a lot of ORCS so I am indifferent from most guards I see now . . .

but, I need to buy my lesser shielding spell and was wondering if I will be KOS inside felwithe . . . anyone know?

I mean if guards outside are not KOS I should be ok inside buying spells right?
